Not exactly, I am talking about block with one transaction that has zaro reward (similar to zero transfer). In this case coinbase is expected to get touched (by state clear EIP).

If it is block without tx, than the coinbase is **not** touched at all, so not including it makes sense.

author: raxhvl
content:
Coinbase TLDR: Coinbase behaves like any other account

Coinbase will only be excluded if the block is entirely empty. Otherwise, it will be included, even when the tip is zero. As with any other account, the coinbase will also be included if it is the recipient of a 4895 withdrawal.
